entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, looking through a circular window in the ceiling.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for wizards and witches that Harry is familiar with.

entities.name: room
entities.description: An enormous room below the surface of a mysterious substance, dimly lit and possibly underground.

entities.name: basin
entities.description: A container or depression in the ground that Harry was expecting to see at first.

relationships.description: Harry is familiar with Hogwarts, but this place is not it.
Harry sees the room through a circular window in the ceiling.
